jd: From: Pavan Kumar, Yochana IT pavank@yochana.com Reply to: pavank@yochana.com Mandatory Skills: GxP Pharma Biotech experienceNeed local to CA consultants onlyJob Details: Senior Delivery Lead/PM is responsible for planning and coordinating the execution of large program deliverables which requires engagement across multiple organizations. The ideal candidate will have pharma experience with GxP Technical Development or Pharma Biotech experience.Mandatory: Senior customer-facing role responsible for planning and coordinating the execution of large program deliverables across multiple business capabilitiesMandatory: Plan and coordinate the execution of large program deliverables which requires engagement across multiple business capabilities.Mandatory: Communicate target outcomes, coordinate delivery, resource planning, provide visibility of program health, and manage program risks, compliance, and financials. Ensure delivery and meet customer’s expectations in terms of the target outcomes, timeline, and cost and facilitate sync points between business and technology leaders and Risk and Compliance partners.Mandatory: Interact with Business Leads and BPOs in Technical Development and manufacturing operations to provide planning, delivery updates, and risk managementLead and coordinate routines to support the delivery of large programs, such as kick-offs, status reviews, stakeholder meetings, change controls, and implementation gatesMandatory: Translate business objectives and requirements to implement technical solutions with traceability to business objectivesDevelop clear communication plans Manage program financials and supports resource planningMaintain compliance with IT policies, controls, and regulations, driving operational excellence, industry best practices and clearly interpret GxP Part 11 requirementsCoordinate internal and external resources, ensure projects remain within scope, schedule and cost
